properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 5 at 3:29AM EST until January 6 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20
knots and waves 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale Watch, west winds to
35 knots and waves 8 to 11 feet possible.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Mexico Bay
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM EST this
afternoon. For the Gale Watch, from Monday afternoon through
Monday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING
